text: Ki tusim unham lokam nu nahim dekhi'a jihare dhokhe vica libare hana, uha apane bharavam nu kahide hana jinham ne kitaba vali'am (yahudi'am ate isa'i'am) vicom inakara kita hai, jekara tusim kadhe ga'e tam asim vi tuhade nala nikala javange. Ate tuhade mamale vica asim kise di gala nahim' manage ate jekara tuhade nala yudha ho'i'a tam asim tuhadi saha'ita karange. Ate alaha gavahi dida hai ki uha jhuthe hana
